mapper.select: SELECT CON_DIV, CON_NO, CON_TITLE, CON_TXT, CON_ID, PASSWORD, READ_COUNT, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE,'MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as REG_DATE, UPD_DATE FROM CONTENTS_DATA WHERE DEL_YN='N' ORDER BY ABS(CON_NO) DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE CONTENTS_DATA SET READ_COUNT = READ_COUNT+1 WHERE CON_NO = #{CON_NO}
